Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are rerouted in both directions via 79th, Kedzie, 71st, Pulaski, 79th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage nr 79th/Central Park

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Kedzie, 71st, Pulaski, 79th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 79th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #29 State
  • #75 75th
  • #79 79th

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested to provide connecting service from Garfield to 95th/Dan Ryan in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
